title: Ride Fueling Calculator
description: Estimate carb, fluid, and sodium targets for long rides.
pageDescription: Build a practical fueling and hydration plan based on duration and intensity.

sections.title: What You Get
content: Carbohydrate target per hour and total carbs.
Fluid target per hour with long-ride adjustment.
Sodium target per hour for electrolyte planning.

sections.title: When To Use
content: Long training rides and endurance events.
Heat-prone sessions where hydration errors are common.
Pre-ride planning to pack enough bottles and fuel.

sections.title: Tips
content: Test fueling in training before event day.
Split carb intake into smaller regular intervals.
Adjust fluid and sodium upward in hot, humid conditions.
